purpose: Defines diagnostic validators for contradiction detection, stress-state identification, missing data inference, and confidence scoring.

contradiction_validator.description: Detects incompatible responses across dimensions or within the same dimension.
checks: identity claims conflicting with emotional style

stress_state_detector.description: Determines if user responses indicate active or latent stress-state.

missing_data_interpreter.description: Determines how to handle skipped, incomplete, or ambiguous answers.
rules: if critical dimension signal missing → impute neutral value
if contradiction pair incomplete → mark low confidence
if scenario answer incomplete → request user clarification
if Likert response missing → assign midpoint

confidence_estimator.description: Generates confidence scores for each dimension and global profile.
calculation_logic: high stress → reduce stability, not confidence
missing data → reduce confidence in affected dimension only
consistency across question types → increase confidence
